DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effective analgesia continuous wound infiltration ropivacaine multi-holed catheter morphine 100 mcg add intrathecally spinal anesthesia , elective Caesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Wound Infusion v Spinal Morphine Post-caesarean Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Double blind , 3 group - Control group : Rachi 0,1 ml saline , Infusion 300ml saline - Group rachi-morphine : 0,1ml =100Âµg morphine/300ml saline - Group KT : 0,1 ml saline/300 ml naropin 0.2 %
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 year , ASA 1 ASA 2 , pregnant least 34 week gestational age , admit plan caesarian Pfannenstiel incision sign informed consent form . Refusal patient contraindication locoregional anesthesia Allergy product use ASA 3 ASA 4 Sleep apnea syndrome and/or obesity ( BMI > 35 ) Size inferior 155cm existence language barrier
